role.argrole: place arg0 enshrines and worships arg1

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VV 供奉) (AS 著) (NP-OBJ (NP-PN (NR 张李莫府)) (NP (NN 千岁))))) (DEC 的))) (NP-PN (NR 五条港) (NR 安西府))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 更)) (VP (VC 是) (NP-PRD (NP (NN 海口) (NN 地带)) (CP (WHNP-3 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (VP (VA 重要))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 信仰) (NN 中心))))))
